tika-s0404t4:2_1: Pañcamassa paṭhamādīsu natthi vattabbaṁ. Chaṭṭhe (saṁ. ni. ṭī.
tika-s0404t4:2_2: 1.1.165) pañca aṅgāni etassāti pañcaṅgaṁ, pañcaṅgameva pañcaṅgikaṁ, tassa pañcaṅgikassa.
tika-s0404t4:2_3: Mahatī daddarī vīṇāvisesopi ātatamevāti ‘‘cammapariyonaddhesū’’ti visesanaṁ kataṁ.
tika-s0404t4:2_6: Sabbaso pariyonaddhaṁ nāma caturassaambaṇaṁ paṇavādi ca.
tika-s0404t4:2_10: Tattha sammatāḷaṁ nāma dantamayatāḷaṁ. Kaṁsatāḷaṁ lohamayaṁ.
tika-s0404t4:2_13: Pamāṇeti nātidaḷhanātisithilasaṅkhāte majjhime mucchanāpamāṇe. Chekoti paṭu paṭṭho.
tika-s0404t4:2_14: So cassa paṭubhāvo manoharoti āha ‘‘sundaro’’ti. Rañjetunti rāgaṁ uppādetuṁ. Khamatevāti rocateva. Na nibbindatīti na tajjeti,
tika-s0404t4:3_0: Bhattāraṁ nātimaññatīti sāmikaṁ muñcitvā aññaṁ manasāpi na pattheti.
tika-s0404t4:3_2: Saṅgahitaparijjanāti sammānanādīhi ceva chaṇādīsu pesetabba-piyabhaṇḍādipaṇṇākārapesanādīhi ca saṅgahitaparijanā.
tika-s0404t4:3_3: Idha parijano nāma sāmikassa ceva attano ca ñātijano.
tika-s0404t4:3_4: Sambhatanti kasivaṇijjādīni katvā ābhatadhanaṁ. Sattamaṭṭhamāni uttānatthāni.
tika-s0404t4:6_2: Yo hi diṭṭhadhammikaṁ anatthaṁ parivajjanavasena abhibhavati,
tika-s0404t4:6_4: so idhalokavijayāya paṭipanno nāma hoti paccatthikaniggaṇhanato sadatthasampādanato ca.
tika-s0404t4:6_6: (Pasaṁsāvahato tayidaṁ pasaṁsāvahanaṁ kittisaddena idhaloke saddānaṁ cittatosanaviddheyyabhāvāpādanena ca hotīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.) Susaṁvihitakammantoti yāgubhattapacanakālādīni anatikkamitvā tassa tassa sādhukaṁ karaṇena suṭṭhu saṁvihitakammanto.
tika-s0404t4:6_8: Yo hi samparāyikaṁ anatthaṁ parivajjanavasena abhibhavati,
tika-s0404t4:6_10: so paralokavijayāya paṭipanno nāma hoti. Sesaṁ sabbattha uttānameva.
